localised_description: The living send their champion to end us, but we will end this breather.
The Beastmen's gor thinks to frustrate us. End the creature.
The northern Gods task their Champions to come against us.
The Witch King's minions are abroad - one in particular must be silenced.
Dwarfs, vile little things who tend to stick their noses where they don't belong. Silence this creature.
Men, nothing more than fuel for the fire; add another corpse to the pyre.
The Greenskins are nothing more than noisome beasts, and now one of their number acts against us. Kill it.
The Asur are cowards. They do not send their hosts against us, but merely mouthed agitators instead. Kill their agent.
Accursed reptiles send an agent to interfere with our plans! End this creature's pathetic existence.
Skaven foes try and undermine us; this will not happen again. Find their verminous agent and slay it.
Insolent Fools! They refuse to bow the knee; their souls are forfeit and will be mine!
My children, you are so vein to defy my word, I gave you life, and I can take it just as easily.
The Elves and their tree-creatures interfere in our expansion by sending an agent against us. Find the threat and destroy it.
They think their Lady can save them; we will purge and seed their lands.
The ice dunes of the Dark Elves are a new realm to add to our own. The land of the dead will stretch to all corners.
The mountain realms of the Dwarfs are valuable to us, for we need what lies in the stone. Claim it.
The men of the north think themselves safe from the dead. Take their land and disabuse them of such a notion.
These filthy creatures are nothing but a hindrance. Purify them from this region and claim it as our own.
The High Elves' arrogance will be their undoing; after all, we are truly immortal, not these fleshy things. Take their realm as punishment!
The reptiles view their borders with intransigence. They must make way as Undeath is Ascendant. Claim this realm for the Undead.
Djaf, the dog-headed God of War and Death, demands that land be conquered from the vermin that infest realms that should belong to Nehekhara.
The true righful ruler, take it back. These are your lands!
Your ambitions and desires cloud your mind; do not fear, Daddy's home.
The woodland realms offer us unique opportunities. Claim such a realm and watch our darkness will infest it.
The rose unfurls to reveal its thorns, does it? We shall show these living fools what a brier patch truly is. Declare war.
These sub-man creatures are no threat to the glory of Nasgah. War on them until their extinction.
Ptra the Creator sends the legions of Nehekhara to war, for the Gods of Chaos stand at the gates to the Realm of Souls and must not be allowed to cross the threshold.
Make war on the Dark Ones in their frozen climes, for that is the only meaningful discourse they understand.
The Dwarfs come to make war and we should not disappoint such stunted foes. Make short work of them!
This king calls himself an 'emperor', but his rule is weak - he is mortal for one thing. Teach this imposter the true meaning of sovereignty - declare war.
The Greenskin menace has festered long enough! Declare war on these primitive tribes and purge them from the world!
The High Elves have become a pain in your regal behind, so it is time to end their place in this world. Call the legions to war!
The Lizardmen threat can no longer be ignored. Declare war on the cold-blooded kind, let them see the power of death.
The ratmen infestation grows. These creatures have ever been a threat, it is time for them to finally perish.
Some do not see your sovereignty and must be dominated. The legions shall meet in battle.
The time to show allegiance has passed; thus I will force your knee, attached to you or not.
The tree-Elves need uprooting. Make war on such long-lived creatures, and show them the true path to immortality.
The prey is marked. Ensure their end.
Conquer these lands for they are yours, whether its denizens - living or dead - know it yet.
Bring about the end of this being - we cannot suffer him to exist any longer!
This army is threat to your rule. Seek them out and bring them to battle.
This place contains crypts of a lost dynasty - it must be scoured.
Such a settlement, teeming with souls, it must be destroyed. Nagash demands it!
Seek out this serf in battle - this dog - and end his pitiful life. Nagash demands nothing less!
This Beastmen may not be the best specimen of their feeble race but it should still be dealt with.
While these men seem obsessed with skulls, we'll take any bones on offer - especially from the body of this Champion!
In battle, hunt down this Dark Elf pretender and extinguish his soul.
There is a Dwarf that frustrates the will of Nagash. Hunt down this nuisance in battle and bring about his death!
The thralls to this child-emperor mock us. We should seek them out in battle and take their flesh-coated skulls.
Find this Orc filth that mocks us. Hunt down in the battle and end it.
Seek out the arrogant breather. Find the High Elf herald and slay it! Our honour demands it.
These reptiles use titles such as 'Oldblood' the arrogance! Ours would be the oldest blood there is, if we still had any. Hunt down this lizard usurper and end it!
Seek out Nagash's bane - the Skaven creature that challenges us. Kill the creature in battle, crush his skull under the weight of dominance!
This serf - this slave - dares to defy you. Hunt it down in battle and break its soul!
Hunt down the Vampire-spawn - find the creature that dares to refuse your call and end its existence quickly.
This Elven creature has been sent to challenge us - seek it out during the battle and kill it. Grind its skull into the ground!
The Errantry War of the men from the north blocks our way. Engage them with our legions.
We have let these Beastmen roam our lands long enough. Bring the warherd to battle!
Chaos comes. The filth-encrusted gods of the north must be stopped. Send your legions forth!
The Druchii come. Engage their dark host and stop them!
Dwarfs send a throng against us. Nagash demands their destruction - engage them in battle!
The uncivilised meat-sacks from the north have raised their banners against us. Meet them in battle - raise the legion!
An Orc rabble has invaded. Show these filth who should be invading who!
The High Elves send a host to face us. Do not let this challenge go.
The Bretonnians invade! Repel these living trespassers, make them pay for disturbing the dead!
So the Beastmen wish to walk the land of the dead? So be it!
A Chaos Horde, sent by their vile Gods, invades our lands. Our God-king demand they should be repelled!
The Witch King's thralls dare to invade our lands - these usurpers must be stopped!
The Dwarfs dare to invade our territory, a foolish decision. Send them back to their mountain burrows!
So the men of the north dare invade the lands of the dead. Slay them, then raise them, make them clamour for their green and soft lands.
The Orcs invade. Show them the true meaning of Waaar!
A High Elf host invades the lands of the ever-living. Repel these trespassers.
The Lizardmen invade! Push these creatures back into their fetid jungles.
Coming from their lairs, the Skaven invade! Send these pests to the abyss!
It would have been amusing if it wasn't for the inconvenience. Yet another pretender invades that must be stopped.
Some of your kin send their legions against us; this is a slight that will not stand. Halt this pathetic invasion.
The Wood Elves dare plant their roots in our unholy soil. Stop this Elven invasion!
War is not the only answer. An alliance is required, for now.
These men defile their dead, parading them around and puppeteering them in mockery of you, my lord; plunder their crypts and raise their dead to fight against them.
The Dark Elf lands hide much valuable lore and secrets to eternal life. Raid their lands and seek such knowledge!
Crack open the Dwarfen Holds and raid their lands, homes and tombs for anything of value.
This young race of men have stolen secrets that belong to Nagash. We shall go, raid and return what has always been ours.
The Orcs have looted and stolen from us for too long. Now, raid their slum lands!
Enter High Elf lands and ravage! No longer will these arrogant upstarts keep what should be ours!
No longer will the Lizardmen hide their so-called knowledge from us. Seek out their treasures, their plaques of lore. Raid their habitat.
We shall plunder the resources of the ratmen. Raid their warrens, destroy their under-world!
This inferior king hides relics we need. Raid his lands, scatter the sands and his legions. All we survey is ours.
Some of the Vampire-kin have locked away treasures that were rightfully yours, reclaim what is owed.
Enter the tree-strewn paths of the Wood Elves and take their life-source - claim it for the Supreme Lord of the Dead.
Under our feet awaits a long-dead legion, eternally loyal and ready to serve. All they needs is for you to utter an incantation of awakening.
Destroy a living city of Bretonnia. Send their presents fleeing into our bony embrace!
Seek out a city of the Dark Elves and raze it to the ground. Every stone must tumble. Nagash demands nothing less.
The Dwarfholds of the stunted are a ripe target for our legions. Make it so.
These men have their own "god" of death that inhabits every stone and garden in their vile realm. We will show them whar a true god of death looks like, topple their city.
The Orcs gather in one of their settlements. Raise the legions and destroy it.
The Gleaming towers of the High Elves attempt to rival the glory of the Black Pyramid. This cannot be allowed to stand - literally.
The temple-cities of the Lizardmen are a cache of lost lore that could bring aid in the Great Ritual, unseal their crypts and burn what is left.
Seek out the Skaven nests and put an end to these vermin once and for all!
The city of a rival Tomb King dares to compete with our greatness! Raze it, and execute execute all who built it, to ensure the Black Pyramid remains the greatest death shrine.
They claim to be creatures of the night, You Are The Night! We will tear down their castles and rip them from their slumber.
The Wood Elves lurk in the deep woods. Send in your skeletal legions and fell any tree that could hold such vermin.
Raise a Tomb Prince or Wight King, these ancient warrior's martial skills will help our cause.
Let's summon a Gunnery Wight shall we? It'll aid our missile units no end - the expertise they've retained from their, er, actual lives, is invaluable to us.
Summon a Liche Priest from the Mortuary Cult to serve.
Call forth a mighty Archai, a sentient vassal bound to your will.
A Vampire Count under our dominion is a powerful ally. Just remember, they are as ambitious in their quest for power as us.
We require a Screaming Skull Catapult to ensure your reign.
Bring forth the doomed knights to serve your majesty.
Summon the legions from the Great Halls so they may serve you in battle.
The archers of ancient Nehekhara remain the best in the world. Ensure they join your legions.
Awaken the war statuary. Stone must march.
Order the chariots into service at once.
